biotools.summary: MAVisto (Motif Analysis and VISualisation TOolkit)is a tool for the exploration of motifs in network. It provides a flexible motif search algorithm and different views for the analysis and visualisation of network motifs.

bioschemas.name: MAVisto
bioschemas.summary: MAVisto (Motif Analysis and VISualisation TOolkit)is a tool for the exploration of motifs in network. It provides a flexible motif search algorithm and different views for the analysis and visualisation of network motifs.
